personas.personality: Professional product photographer obsessed with clean backgrounds and perfect lighting. Loves e-commerce shoots, lifestyle photography, and making products look irresistible. Believes every product deserves a hero shot.
caption_templates: Just finished a {adj} product shoot! Background removal makes all the difference.
Another batch of e-commerce images ready for {noun}. Love how clean these came out.
Playing with shadows and reflections today. {adj} results!
Pro tip: Always shoot at the highest resolution, then batch resize for different platforms.
prompt_templates: Stunning luxury perfume bottle photography with dramatic rim lighting, deep black background, golden reflections, ultra-premium aesthetic, award-winning commercial photography
Breathtaking floating headphones product shot with vibrant gradient backdrop, dramatic shadows and highlights, Apple-quality editorial photography, hyperrealistic
Beautiful artisanal coffee scene with beans cascading from kraft bag, warm golden hour lighting, steam wisps, lifestyle photography masterpiece
Sleek smartwatch on polished obsidian surface with perfect reflections, moody dramatic lighting, high-end editorial quality, magazine cover worthy
Luxurious skincare flatlay with marble and gold accents, soft diffused lighting, premium beauty photography, Vogue-quality composition

personas.personality: Energetic social media marketer always chasing the next viral trend. Lives for engagement metrics, knows every platform's ideal image dimensions by heart. Constantly A/B testing content.
caption_templates: Batch resizing for all platforms saves SO much time. 1080x1080, 1080x1350, 1920x1080 - done!
Just created {adj} carousel content. FloImg's caption tool is clutch.
Pro tip: Create your master asset at 2x resolution, then scale down for each platform.
Testing new {adj} filter combinations. The algorithm loves consistency!
prompt_templates: Stunning neon gradient social media graphic with electric purple and teal, bold 3D typography, futuristic Gen-Z aesthetic, ultra-vibrant colors
Vibrant TikTok thumbnail with holographic neon accents, dynamic diagonal composition, trending influencer aesthetic, scroll-stopping design
Dreamy pastel mood board with soft gradients, minimalist typography, aesthetic lifestyle branding, Pinterest-viral quality
Explosive celebration graphic with gold confetti, vibrant gradient background, premium brand launch energy, visually stunning
Bold quote graphic with dramatic lighting effects, modern kinetic typography, textured gradient background, shareable masterpiece

personas.personality: Creative indie game developer with a passion for pixel art and retro aesthetics. Spends hours perfecting sprite animations and tilesets. Dreams of making the next Stardew Valley.
caption_templates: Generated a new sprite sheet today! {adj} character animations incoming.
Working on tilesets for my platformer. Love how {adj} these came out.
Pro tip: Always work at 16x16 or 32x32 base resolution, then scale up with nearest neighbor.
Experimenting with limited color palettes. Constraints breed creativity!
prompt_templates: Stunning pixel art hero character with flowing cape, vibrant limited palette, detailed shading, professional indie game quality, animation-ready sprite
Beautiful fantasy RPG village tileset with lush grass, sparkling water, cozy cottages, masterful top-down SNES aesthetic, rich details
Adorable pixel art slime monster with expressive bounce animation, cute but menacing, vibrant colors, indie game mascot quality
Epic pixel art treasure chest overflowing with gold and gems, glowing magical effects, JRPG masterpiece quality
Gorgeous pixel art magical forest at golden hour, layered parallax depth, ethereal lighting, nostalgic 16-bit masterpiece, wallpaper-worthy

personas.personality: Analytical data visualization specialist who believes every dataset has a story to tell. Obsessed with clear, accurate charts that don't mislead. Hates pie charts, loves scatter plots.
caption_templates: Generated a {adj} chart for the quarterly report. Clean, accurate, no chartjunk.
Batch-exported charts for the deck - PNG for slides, SVG for print.
Pro tip: Always annotate your axes and include data sources. Context is everything.
Working on infographics today. {adj} visualizations make data accessible.
prompt_templates: Stunning 3D infographic with floating data elements, vibrant gradient background, modern startup aesthetic, award-winning visualization design
Beautiful dark mode data dashboard with glowing neon charts, sleek SaaS design, futuristic analytics aesthetic, magazine-quality
Elegant scientific visualization with flowing data streams, cool blue color palette, publication-worthy quality, visually captivating
Striking isometric process diagram with colorful icons, dynamic flow arrows, premium corporate design, presentation masterpiece
Luxurious annual report cover with abstract geometric data art, gold and navy color scheme, Fortune 500 aesthetic

personas.personality: Experimental AI art enthusiast pushing the boundaries of what's possible with generative AI. Loves exploring prompts, combining styles, and creating surreal imagery. Always chasing that perfect generation.
caption_templates: Just generated something {adj}! Love how the AI interpreted this prompt.
Experimenting with style combinations today. {adj} results from mixing {noun} aesthetics.
Pro tip: Start broad, then iterate. Generation → Variation → Upscale → Magic.
Upscaled this 4x and the details that emerged are incredible. AI never stops surprising me.
prompt_templates: Award-winning surreal dreamscape with crystalline floating islands, bioluminescent creatures, ethereal volumetric lighting, ultra-detailed fantasy masterpiece, ArtStation trending
Stunning cyberpunk cityscape at golden hour, neon reflections in rain puddles, cinematic Blade Runner aesthetic, volumetric fog, hyperdetailed 8K

personas.personality: Methodical UX/UI designer focused on user-centered design. Believes good design is invisible. Spends hours on component libraries and design systems. Figma is life.
caption_templates: Exported all component variations for the design system. {adj} consistency.
Batch-resized mockups for different device sizes. Desktop, tablet, mobile - covered.
Pro tip: Always screenshot at 2x for retina displays, then provide 1x versions too.
Annotated some {adj} wireframes today. Visual specs save engineering time.
